tasks.title: Refine SmartModelRouter Failure Tracking
tasks.description: Enhance SmartModelRouter to track and adapt to model failure rates more effectively. Implement dynamic cooling-off periods for models based on historical success and failure rates.

tasks.title: Enhance Tool Registry Auto-Discovery
tasks.description: Improve the auto-discovery mechanism in tools/registry.py to dynamically recognize and register new tools and models without manual updates. Incorporate semantic analysis for better categorization and compatibility checking.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Pattern Support in Workflows
tasks.description: Develop and integrate advanced pattern recognition capabilities into Workflows and WorkflowsOrchestrator.py. This includes support for conditional execution flows and dynamic task reassignment based on runtime analysis and model performance.

notes: Focus on enhancing SmartModelRouter and Workflows for improved adaptability and efficiency in tier-based routing and execution.
